Project_Objective.Tasks:
PLM+Metals:
 ‚Ä¢ Analyze the material properties for Interior, Exterior, BIW & Powertrain adaptive parts. 
‚Ä¢ Quotation of material assessment in PLM for Interior, Exterior, BIW & Powertrain adaptive parts.

Derogation: 
‚Ä¢ Validate and approve derogation request for BIW parts in consultation with STLA experts.

Labo Support & Metal & Anticorrosion: 
‚Ä¢ Documentation of analysis report.
 ‚Ä¢ Perform laboratory analysis.

Source approval:
‚Ä¢ Tracking the progress of compatibility test.
 ‚Ä¢ Harmonization of compatibility test reports for source approval.
 ‚Ä¢ Gather and integrate feasibility data from suppliers for approved grades in feasibility file.

Soft trims: 
‚Ä¢ Review and evaluate the MSE test report against the Stellantis specification/MCF requirements. 
 ‚Ä¢ Organize regular meeting with supplier to track the material development status including colour/embossing, etc.
 ‚Ä¢ Review and evaluate the MCF file against the Stellantis specification.
Project_Objective.Objectives: Materials proposed by suppliers are compliant with STLA specifications and standards.‚Äã
Project_Objective.Timing:
PLM+Metals: PLM rating should be given before the agreed date for the release. (Defined in the RT meeting)
Derogation: Client/Requestor indicates the time when they require the result or approval.
Source approval: Activity timed by client (Stellantis).
Soft trims: Activity timed by project milestones and project technical reviews.

Project_Objective.Tasks:
Documentation:
‚Ä¢ Translate and/or format material specifications
‚Ä¢ Formalize material specifications
‚Ä¢ Update the materials database in BASMAT

PMMP: On Vehicle Projects
‚Ä¢ Create a materials notice with the STELLANTIS template, for supplier choice at project start
‚Ä¢ Create and/or update material specifications for technical RFQ
‚Ä¢ Create a material notice for technical reviews
‚Ä¢ Create Materials notice for Drawings validation 
‚Ä¢ Materials proposed by suppliers are compliant with STLA specifications and standards

PFDI:
‚Ä¢ Expertise: Create feedback report on material cards
‚Ä¢ Equivalence: Suggesting equivalent materials (Radioss, Nastran, LSDYNA & ABAQUS) from Stellantis database for new commercial materials
Project_Objective.Objectives: Material compliance is verified and databases are UpTo Date in accordance with  STLA technical specifications and standards.
Project_Objective.Timing:
Documentation: Monthly update of the PSA materials database (customer cdc)
‚Ä¢ PMMP: Activity timed by supplier choice project milestones and project technical reviews
‚Ä¢ PFDI: Activity timed by supplier choice project milestones and project technical reviews
